name: AllMyPPL Parse Server
description: An example of how you can integrate twilio and parse-server-mailgun, parse-node and parse-server modules with a heroku-hosted nodejs / express server.

APP_NAME.description: appName is used in email templates.

ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE.description: Use an enviroment variable like this to set your keys, secrets and credentials without exposing them to the public, they can be accessed in your code as process.env.ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE
